choose.when:
select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${cal}(${element}) as val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime)
choose.otherwise:
SELECT stationNo,stationName,longitude,latitude,val,year FROM (select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${cal}(${element}) as val,YEAR(ObserverTime)+1 as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime) UNION ALL select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,${cal}(${element}) as val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime)) t GROUP BY stationNo,year

choose.when:
select t.stationNO,b.station_name as stationName,b.latitude,b.longitude,COUNT(1) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime)
choose.otherwise:
SELECT year,sum(val) as val,stationNo,stationName,longitude,latitude FROM ( select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.latitude,b.longitude,COUNT(1) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime)+1 as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime) UNION ALL select t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.latitude,b.longitude,COUNT(1) AS val,YEAR(ObserverTime) as year
GROUP BY stationNo,YEAR(ObserverTime) )t GROUP BY stationNo,year

mapper.select: SELECT t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,t.event_year as year ,CONCAT(t.event_year,t.event_time) as time,${element} as val FROM t_mete_climate_first_soaker t,geography_station_info b WHERE t.stationNo = b.device_id

SELECT t.stationNo,b.station_name as stationName,b.longitude,b.latitude,t.event_year as year ,CONCAT( t.event_year, t.event_time ) as time,t.event_time as val FROM base_four_season_data t,geography_station_info b WHERE t.stationNo = b.device_id and season_type = #{cal} and time_type = '1'
